timeline.bodyText: hmm, since this is a map codec, is there cases where like there is a json object which you can derive both a biome and some other stuff from that one json object? I assume this exists so the registry codec can either dispatch to an id field lookup or pass the object to this map codec?
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: I don't understand much about codecs, but the registry codec here is a registry element codec cast to a codec, hence the name
replies.author: YanisBft
